resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106529</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106529</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087647</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gateway to Educational Materials</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gateway zu den pädagogischen Materialien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gateway aux matériaux éducatifs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gateway aos materiais educacionais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gateway ai materiali educativi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πύλη στα εκπαιδευτικά υλικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gateway a los materiales educativos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The Gateway to Educational Materials is a Consortium effort to provide educators with quick and easy access to thousands of educational resources found on various federal, state, university, non-profit, and commercial Internet sites.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Gateway zu den pädagogischen Materialien ist 
eine Vereinigungbemühung, Erzieher mit schnellem und einfachem 
Zugriff zu den Tausenden der pädagogischen Betriebsmittel zu 
versehen, die auf verschiedenen Bundes-, des Zustandes, der 
Universität, gemeinnütziger und kommerzieller Internet-Sites 
gefunden werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Gateway aux matériaux éducatifs est un effort
de consortium de fournir à des éducateurs l'accès rapide et facile 
aux milliers de ressources éducatives trouvées sur de divers sites 
Internet fédéraux, d'état, d'université, sans but lucratif, et 
commerciaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Gateway aos materiais educacionais é um 
esforço do consortium fornecer educadores com o acesso rápido e 
fácil aos milhares dos recursos educacionais encontrados em vários 
locais federais, do estado, da universidade, os non-profit, e os 
comerciais de Internet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Gateway ai materiali educativi è uno sforzo 
del consorzio fornire agli educatori rapido ed accesso facile alle 
migliaia delle risorse educative trovate luoghi senza scopo di lucro e
e commerciali su vario federale, dichiarano, dell'università, di
Internet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πύλη στα εκπαιδευτικά υλικά είναι μια προσπάθεια 
κοινοπραξίας να παρασχεθούν οι εκπαιδευτικοί τη γρήγορη και 
εύκολη πρόσβαση σε χιλιάδες εκπαιδευτικά στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς 
που βρίσκονται διάφορο σε ομοσπονδιακό, το κράτος, τους 
πανεπιστημιακούς, μη κερδοσκοπικούς, και εμπορικούς χώρους 
διαδικτύου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Gateway a los materiales educativos es un 
esfuerzo del consorcio de proveer de educadores el acceso rápido y 
fácil a los millares de recursos educativos encontrados en varios 
sitios federales, del estado, de la universidad, no lucrativos, y 
comerciales de Internet.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087647</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">No License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106529</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/matters/gateway-to-educational-materials</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
